description: The activity diary process name
The date/time of the last update to the activity
The activity that happened (eg. Contact w insured, inspection, follow-up, etc)
The short description for the activity
The start date/time for the activity
The finish date/time for the activity
Indicates if there is a reminder set for this activity
Indicates if the activity is marked as todo
This indicates it's a test assignment
Claim Number
For Activity Diary incurred expenses, a description of the activity
For Activity Diary incurred expenses, the number of hours for that activity
For Activity Diary incurred expenses, the total amount
For Activity Diary incurred expenses, the expense code
For Activity Diary incurred expenses, the expense code description
For Activity Diary incurred expenses, total number of miles driven
Indicates if the expense is paid by the employer
Indicates if a personal car was used
Indicates if there is no charge for the activity
Indicates if the expense is prorated

The XactAnalysis address of the person (adjustor/contractor) receiving the assignment in the field. Xactimate users receive a XactAnalysis address when they successfully register. Either the recipient’s XactAnalysis Address or the recipient’s ID is required.
This is the original transaction ID for the claim.
XactAnalysis's internal ID for the assignment. This is added by XactAnalysis for new assignments.
